meanings.sent1: The cake was dense and heavy, like a brick.
meanings.sent2: The forest was dense with trees, making it hard to see through.
meanings.sent3: The suitcase was so dense with clothes that it wouldn't close properly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt dense with thoughts, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The fog was so dense that you could barely see your hand in front of your face.

meanings.sent1: The professor's lecture was so dense that most students struggled to follow.
meanings.sent2: The scientific paper was filled with dense jargon that confused many readers.
meanings.sent3: The plot of the movie was so dense that it left the audience scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was so dense that it only added to the confusion.
meanings.sent5: The math problem was so dense that even the tutor had trouble solving it.

meanings.definition: having high mass per unit volume
meanings.sent1: The dense rock sank quickly in the water due to its weight.
meanings.sent2: The dense metal was difficult to lift because of its heaviness.
meanings.sent3: The dense cake was so rich that it felt like a weight in your stomach.
meanings.sent4: The dense cloud hung low in the sky, full of rain.
meanings.sent5: The dense fruit was so juicy and heavy, it almost fell off the tree.
